name: Introducción a Google Cloud Platform
description: En este meetup presentaremos a la comunidad de Google Cloud Developer Community Peru y veremos los diferentes servicios que podremos usar en Google Cloud .

name: GCP y Google Assistant con .nET

venue.name: WeWork Avenida Juan de Aliaga 360, Magdalena del Mar
venue.address_1: WeWork Avenida Juan de Aliaga 360, Magdalena del Mar
venue.address_2: WeWork Avenida Juan de Aliaga 360, Magdalena del Mar

description:
[IMPORTANTE] La charla será 100% en INGLES

It is a pleasure to present to Mete Atamel, Mete is a Developer Advocate at Google, focused on helping developers with Google Cloud. As a long-time Java and C# developer, he likes to compare the two ecosystems. Prior to Google, he worked at Microsoft, Skype, Adobe, EMC, and Nokia building apps and services on various web, mobile and cloud platforms. Originally from the island of Cyprus, he currently lives in Greenwich of London, not too far away from the prime meridian.

He will present the talk: "Google Assistant powered by Containers, Machine Learning and .NET on Google Cloud"

What does it take to connect Google Assistant to the cloud? Surprisingly, not much! In this talk, we will create a Dialogflow app to get Google Assistant to talk to a container managed by Kubernetes/App Engine. In the container, we’ll use some of the Machine Learning APIs and BigQuery and see how they can elevate our Google Assistant app to the next level. We will also integrate with Stackdriver and see how you can get more insights about your app with HTTP tracing and live debugging features of Stackdriver.

name: Meetup #1
description:
Tenemos nuestro primer Meetup del año! En esta ocasión tendremos los siguientes temas:

Antonio Guzmán: Escalamiento y alta disponibilidad con Google Cloud
Carlo Huamán : ServerLess architecture four your Actions by Google Cloud

Agradecemos a La Victoria Lab por ser host del evento.
